item.description:
What better way to kick off the fourth of July weekend with drinks and dancing at Shish Lounge in West Hartford this Friday night! Let's plan to meet there for 9:30p.m. It has had some good reviews and our members have said it was a fun time.

________________________________________________________________________________

West Hartford has actually made some national lists of up and coming places to go out on the town. If you've been there than you know what they are talking about. The Center has actually been redone lately and has many places to go out to and you can always find one that fit's your style. In general though the area is more upscale than Hartford downtown.

Looking forward to another great night once again! Call me if you get disorientated. 860-919-9782

Cheers,
John
item.name: Shish Lounge in West Hartford
